explains: n. 垄断，垄断权；垄断企业，专卖者；独占，专利品；大富翁（棋类游戏,游戏者以玩具钞票买卖房地产）
wordGroup: natural monopoly 自然独占；天然垄断
national monopoly 国家垄断；国家专利
monopoly capitalism 垄断资本主义
absolute monopoly 完全垄断，绝对垄断
monopoly right 专利权，专卖权
legal monopoly 法定专利，法定独占
industrial monopoly 垄断；工业专利

sentences.en: Had he succeeded, he would have acquired a monopoly.
sentences.cn: 如果他那时成功了，他就会获得垄断地位。

sentences.en: The company has a virtual monopoly in this area of trade.
sentences.cn: 这家公司实质上已经垄断了这种贸易。

sentences.en: Planters enjoyed a natural monopoly because they had no competitors.
sentences.cn: 种植园主享受着自然的垄断，因为他们没有竞争者。
